ThingDef.label: Steel Air Cooler

ThingDef.label: Ceramic Air Cooler
ThingDef.description: P : 400W, T/s : -63 Ceramic Air Cooler with good performance. Have to be placed on a wall.

ThingDef.label: Steel Ventilation
ThingDef.description: Very simple ventilation, giving breathable air and transmitting heat between rooms. Have to be placed on a wall.

ThingDef.label: Filtering Ventilation
ThingDef.description: Good quality ventilation increases the comfort of the room. Have to be placed on a wall.

ThingDef.label: Cozy Ventilation
ThingDef.description: Filter ventilation of very good quality, greatly increasing the comfort of the room. Have to be placed on a wall.
